Properties

 The unique ID of this reservation.
NSString * ownerId
 The AWS Access Key ID of the user who owns the reservation.
NSString * requesterId
 The unique ID of the user who requested the instances in this reservation.

 The list of security groups requested for the instances in this reservation.

Member Function Documentation

- (void EC2Reservation.)addGroup: (EC2GroupIdentifier *)  group  

Adds a single object to groups.

This function will alloc and init groups if not already done.

- (void EC2Reservation.)addInstance: (EC2Instance *)  instance  

Adds a single object to instances.

This function will alloc and init instances if not already done.

Returns a string representation of this object; useful for testing and debugging.

A string representation of this object.
